item.title: Blue Green vs Canary vs Rolling Deployment
item.description: In this post we will compare the most popular deployment strategies, namely: Rolling Blue-Green Canary Rolling Deployments It’s the simplest deployment strategy which involves updating software systems by gradually replacing instances in a rolling fashion. Here’s how it generally works: The new version of the software is deployed on a subset of instances, while the remaining instances continue to run the previous version. Traffic is then gradually shifted from the old instances to the new instances, ensuring a smooth transition.
